description:
Even with the strength of the leader of the East, Sumako, Mayuko, Shigure and the oThther monks, they are no match against Hakumen no Mono. Hakumen no Mono heads toward the main island of Japan from Okinawa for more fear from the humans as well as for destruction. While in the ocean, Ushio begins to dream about a man from long ago. The truth about Hakumen`s birth is finally revealed.
Source: crunchyroll
